question: What part of the pouch is an object put into?
options: The object is placed in the front flap of the pouch.
The object is inserted into the main compartment of the pouch.
The object is stored in the back pocket of the pouch.
The object is put into the side pocket of the pouch.

inference.prompt:

(B) The object is inserted into the main compartment of the pouch.
